result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on November 29, 2022 at 09:30 am.

(Cases 20CF1577, 20CT291, 21CF49, 21CM190, 21CT228, 22CM101, 22CM511, 22CM696 are called at 11:49 AM) Defendant Jonathan D. Richardson in court with Attorney Katherine Cook.  Attorney Robert Stoiber in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defense indicates there are motions forthcoming. 
Status Conference (possible motion hearing) on all cases: 11/29/2022 at 9:30 AM (Set for 30 minutes).
Status conference on October 25, 2022 at 11:45 am.

11:35am Cases called: 20CF1577, 20CT291, 21CF49, 21CM190, 21CT228, 22CM101, 22CM511 & 22CM696. Defendant Jonathan D. Richardson in court.  Attorney Katherine Cook in court for Jonathan D. Richardson. Attorney Andrew Gunderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 

There is not an agreement at this time. Status Conference: 10/25/22 at 11:45am
Status conference on October 3, 2022 at 11:05 am.

Case called at 9:36 AM: 20CF1577, 20CT291, 21CF49, 21CM190, 21CT228, 22CM101, 22CM511, 22CM696.
Defendant Jonathan D. Richardson in court with Attorney Katherine Cook. Deputy District Attorney Angela Lynn Beranek in court for State of Wisconsin. 
22CM696: State requests $500 Cash Bond (8 open files, history of failing to appear, bond violations. Court orders $100 Cash Bond.
STC: 10/3/22 at 11:05 AM.

Cases called at 9:31 AM.
Defendant Jonathan D. Richardson not in court.  Attorney Katherine Cook in court for Attorney Alicia Linzmeier. Attorney Angela Lynn Beranek in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Cook notes that the Defendant has orientation for a new job this morning and was unable to attend court. 
Attorney Cook additionally notes that she will be taking these cases over for Attorney Linzmeier and requests an adjournment .
STC: 8/19/22 at 9:30 AM.
Initial appearance on July 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.

(Case called at 12:01 PM) Defendant Jonathan D. Richardson not in court.  Attorney Afton Lewis in court for State of Wisconsin. 
State indicates the Defendant has other open cases with dates. 
Initial Appearance: 07/22/2022 at 9:00 AM (Branch 4).
